src:
Persebaya Disanksi Tanpa Suporter Hingga Akhir Musim, Begini Respon Aji Santoso
02 Nov 2019, 10:48 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Persebaya Surabaya mendapat sanksi berat pasca kericuhan pada laga kontra PSS Sleman, Selasa (29/10/2019) lalu. Green Force harus membayar denda sebesar Rp. 200 juta.
Tidak hanya itu, Persebaya akan bermain tanpa suporter saat laga kandang maupun tandang. Sanksi itu akan berlaku hingga berakhirnya kompetisi Shopee Liga 1 2019 yang disiarkan Indosiar.
Menanggapi hal itu, pelatih Persebaya, Aji Santoso, mengatakan bahwa sanksi tersebut pasti akan berpengaruh terhadap tim. Namun, mau tidak mau harus diterima karena sudah menjadi keputusan Komdis PSSI.
"Ini tadi sudah saya sampaikan ke seluruh pemain, apapun keputusan dari federasi kita tetap harus menerima," kata Aji Santoso, Sabtu (2/11/2019).
Hanya saja, mantan pelatih Persela Lamongan tersebut, berharap agar sanksi itu tidak berdampak terhadap permainan Persebaya. Apalagi sampai mengubah karakter Green Force.

Scroll ke bawah untuk informasi selengkapnya ya Bolaneters
text:
Persebaya Disanksi without supporters until the end of the season, Here's Aji Santoso's response
02 Nov 2019, 10:48 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Persebaya Surabaya received severe sanctions after the riot in the counter PSS Sleman match, last Tuesday (10/29/2019). Green Force must pay a fine of Rp. 200 million.
Not only that, Persebaya will play without supporters during home and away matches. The sanctions will apply until the end of the Shopee Liga 1 2019 broadcast by Indosiar.
In response, Persebaya coach Aji Santoso said that the sanctions would definitely affect the team. However, inevitably it must be accepted because it has become a decision of the PSSI Commis.
"I have conveyed this to all players, whatever decision the federation has to do, we must accept it," said Aji Santoso, Saturday (11/02/2019).
It's just that, the former coach of Persela Lamongan, hopes that the sanctions will not affect the game Persebaya. Especially to change the character of Green Force.

Scroll down for more information, Bolaneters
